thread.title: Pune: FIR filed against Ranveer Singh and Sanjay Leela Bhansali
thread.title_full: Pune: FIR filed against Ranveer Singh and Sanjay Leela Bhansali | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Pune: FIR filed against Ranveer Singh and Sanjay Leela Bhansali
text:
A Pune based lawyer on Friday reportedly filed an FIR against Bollywood actor Ranveer Singh and director Sanjay Leela Bhansali for being allegedly manhandled by bouncers present at the shoot of Bhansali's Bajirao Mastani .
The lawyer, Wajid Khan, has alleged in his complaint that he was manhandled and pushed by the bouncers when he raised an objected over the film's shooting. According to him, the shoot was being carried out without proper permissions from the concerned authorities and that is why he was objecting.
Ranveer Singh will be seen portraying the role of Peshwa Baji Rao, while Deepika Padukone will feature as his second wife Mastani and Priyanka Chopra as Kashibai, Baji Rao's first wife.
The film will clash with Shah Rukh Khan's Dilwale , which is a comedy-action film, directed by Rohit Shetty. Both movies are scheduled for a December 18 release.
